title: Are all narcissist materialistic or are they just selfish? - Quora

response.answer_text: All narcissists aren't the same. They are all people (or cats,) and they are all narcissistic. Some are materialistic and some aren't, just like any other people. I don't like the people kind because I tend to get hurt by them. I do like some of the feline ones, however. I don't believe that the feline narcissists are particularly materialistic but I could be wrong because I'm no expert on feline narcissism.

Narcissist and sociopaths are both empty souls. What does that mean? Not having any “real” feelings for others only oneself, they try to fill-up with everything external. So they will try to use money, greed, envy, lust, attention, status, position, material items - cars, houses, boats, clothes, etc.. to “feel” better about themselves. All of these things, of course, are short lived and then they will have to move on to the next thing.

Both have been my experience with a narcissist boyfriend for years he always had to have the best cars even in kindergarten I was told by his parents that he refused to go unless he was wearing a tie now isn’t that strange for a child and he continued until he was in the third grade and eventually stopped but always had a Porsche,Jaguar and also has had a Benz he has nothing at the moment from what I understand and that includes me also .
Mine is not materialistic at all. He's all about collecting ppl for his fan club. Unfortunately the kids and I are not as important as acquaintances, coworkers and strangers.
